content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (20.5, -4.0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (22.5, -7.5)
- Boiler at position (20.5, -4.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (4.5, -10.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the boiler and steam engine, starting at position (20.5, -10.5) and ending at position (20.5, -5.5)
- Small Electric Poles providing power distribution, with poles at positions (24.5, -6.5), (24.5, -7.5), and (22.5, -4.5)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (10.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at position (10.5, 0.5)
- Inserter at position (-3.5, 1.5) waiting for source items
- Small Electric Poles at positions (10.5, -1.5), (12.5, 0.5), and (12.5, 1.5)
- Belt Group connecting input and output positions, with belts running from (10.5, 4.5) to (10.5, 6.5) and from (9.5, 6.5) to (7.5, 6.5)

### Iron Plate Production at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Inserter at position (7.5, 5.5) waiting for source items
- Wooden Chest at position (8.5, 5.5)

### Iron Ore Mining at Position (-11.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-11.0, 20.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-11.5, 18.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Assembling Machine Not Producing Copper Cables
- Ensure the assembling machine has all required ingredients. In this case, make sure copper plates are available for the copper cable recipe.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Check that the inserter has access to source items. Ensure the supply chain is intact and source items are available for the inserter to pick up.

### Errors when Using Assembling Machine
- Verify that the assembling machine is properly connected to power and has the necessary resources to function.
